nhdplusTools 0.1.0
  • Reference

nhdplus refactor

Source: R/nhdplus_refactor.R
nhdplus_refactor.Rd

refactors nhdplud flowlines

nhdplus_refactor(nhdplus_flines, split_flines_meters, split_flines_cores,
  collapse_flines_meters, collapse_flines_main_meters, out_collapsed,
  out_reconciled, three_pass = FALSE)

Arguments

nhdplus_flines

data.frame nhdplus flowloines
split_flines_meters

numeric split threshold in meters
split_flines_cores

numeric number of cores to use for split function
collapse_flines_meters

numeric collapse threshold in meters
collapse_flines_main_meters

numeric collapse threshold for mainstems in meters
out_collapsed

character geopackage path to write collapsed to (one layer per gpkg)
out_reconciled

character geopackage path to write reconciled to (one layer per gpkg)
three_pass

boolean perform three collapse passes or just one

Contents

  • Arguments
